name: Exploration Game (bombproof)
description:
This game was created as part of my college learning, this is one part of 5 projects.

Assets were used from the unity asset store. 

The trees were taken from this pack.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/poly-low-trees-pack-fr...

The star skybox was taken from this pack.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/real-stars-skybox-l...

and the character controller was taken from this pack.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/packs/obstacle-course-pack-17816...
